pkgmetadata.longdescription: Adaptive Optimal Two-Stage Designs // Optimize one or two-arm, two-stage designs for clinical trials with respect to several implemented objective criteria or custom objectives. Optimization under uncertainty and conditional (given stage-one outcome) constraints are supported. See Pilz et al. (2019) doi:10.1002/sim.8291 and Kunzmann et al. (2021) doi:10.18637/jss.v098.i09 for details.
